Is this information helpful?
Meet the hiring team
Vickus Ng (IHRP - CA) 
3rd
Recruitment Consultant (Tech Team) at ScienTec Consulting
Job poster
Message
About the job
Work Life Balance with hybrid work arrangement
Play a key role in building and enhancing large-scale citizen-facing applications that directly benefit millions across Singapore.
Working on modern technologies such as JavaScript/TypeScript, cloud (AWS)

Are you a passionate Software Developer? We need you!
You will be working within an innovative team to develop a software application for Singaporean.
Salary up to $11,000 + AWS
Up to 21 days of Annual Leave, Birthday off, etc

Responsibilities:
Participate in end-to-end software development cycle which including front-end and back-end development.
Develop responsive and user-friendly web interfaces using ReactJS.
Collaborate with UI/UX designers to implement design mockups into code.
Design, develop, and maintain server-side logic using NodeJS.
Implement RESTful APIs for seamless communication between the frontend and backend.
Design and implement database schemas using technologies such as MySQL, or other relevant databases.
Write unit tests to ensure the reliability and stability of the application.

Requirements:
Experience in web application development using NodeJS
Experience with cloud platforms e.g.: Amazon AWS, Google Cloud Platform, Azure, etc
Experience in SQL databases
Familiar with front-end development framework such as ReactJS, TypeScript, jQuery and Bootstrap
Familiar with JavaScript unit testing frameworks such as Jest, Mocha, or Jasmine
Familiar with Agile and CI/CD practices
Familiar with Git version control tools

If you’re ready to lead impactful government projects and advance your career in a forward-thinking environment, submit your resume today! 
By submitting your resume, you consent to the collection, use, and disclosure of your personal information per ScienTec’s Privacy Policy (scientecconsulting.com/privacy-policy).

This authorizes us to:
~ Contact you about potential opportunities. 
~ Delete personal data as it is not required at this application stage. 
All applications will be processed with strict confidence. Only shortlisted candidates will be contacted. 
Ng Kee Hung (Vickus) - R2091423
ScienTec Consulting Pte Ltd - 11C5781

An award-winning company founded in 2004, ScienTec has transformed organizations across Asia Pacific with our 4 principle services: Staffing, Specialist Search, Outsourcing and HR Consulting.
⠀⠀⠀ ⠀
Our "People First, Always" core value underpins our mission to redefine the standards of HR services and deliver you top-tier candidate support, as reflected in our attainment of key accolades such as Recruitment Agency of the Year, Best Client Service, and Best Candidate Experience.
⠀⠀⠀ ⠀
Our sector and functional coverage include ICT/technology, industrial engineering, and corporate services recruitment.
⠀⠀⠀ ⠀
By submitting your resume, you give your express consent that ScienTec Consulting may use your personal information to process your job application and to contact you from time to time for future employment opportunities.

For further information on how ScienTec Consulting processes your personal information and how to access and correct your information, please read the ScienTec Consulting’s Privacy Policy (https://www.scientecconsulting.com/privacy-policy).

Please do not submit any sensitive personal data to us in your resume (such as government ID numbers, ethnicity, gender, religion, marital status) as we do not collect your personal data at this time.
⠀⠀⠀ ⠀
All job applications will be processed with strict confidence and only shortlisted candidates will be contacted.
